body:
~(EDIT 8/12: fixing some problems with this, I'll remove this message when this PR is useful for debugging)~ (UPDATE: this is now useful for debugging errors)

This is for debugging https://github.com/spack/spack/issues/12323

It doesn't contain any fix (since I don't know what the problem is yet) - it is for printing out additional information. I will update it as I get ideas about other things to try.

@adamjstewart @citibeth would you be able to use this branch to rerun failing Spack commands related to https://github.com/spack/spack/issues/12323 and report the output here?
title: [WIP] Debugging spurious deactivate for environment view
